name: Proficio
tagline: San Diego Managed Security Service Provider
description:
Proficio is a next-generation managed security service provider (MSSP) providing 24×7 security monitoring and advanced data breach prevention services to mid to large-sized enterprises. 
We have developed proprietary security content and threat intelligence tools to identify and proactively defend against advanced attacks and insider threats.

locations.address: 51 Changi Business Park Central 2 #03-11, The Signature
